storage.enter_absolute_path: Please enter an absolute path (e.g. D:\RooCodeStorage or /home/user/storage)

error.failed_to_get_login_info: Failed to get login information. Please log in again to use the completion service.

infor.enable_disable_function_quick_menu: Enable/Disable "Function Quick Menu" and "Intelligent Code Completion"

explain.name: Explain Code
explain.input_prompt: What would you like ZGSM to explain?
explain.input_placeholder: E.g. How does the error handling work?

add_comment.name: Add Comments
add_comment.input_prompt: What would you like ZGSM to do?
add_comment.input_placeholder: E.g. Add comments to the code

add_tests.name: Generate Unit Tests
add_tests.tip: Generate unit tests for this function
add_tests.input_prompt: What would you like ZGSM to do?
add_tests.input_placeholder: E.g. Generate unit tests for this function

code_review.name: Code Review
code_review.tip: Check for code quality issues and provide suggestions
code_review.input_prompt: What would you like ZGSM to do?
code_review.input_placeholder: E.g. Check for code quality issues and provide suggestions to the code

add_debug_code.name: Add Debug Code
add_debug_code.tip: Enhance troubleshooting capabilities by adding logs and debug code to key logic steps
add_debug_code.input_prompt: What would you like ZGSM to do?
add_debug_code.input_placeholder: E.g. Enhance troubleshooting capabilities by adding logs and debug code to key logic steps to the code

add_stronger_code.name: Add Error Handling
add_stronger_code.tip: Enhance robustness by adding exception handling and parameter validation
add_stronger_code.input_prompt: What would you like ZGSM to do?
add_stronger_code.input_placeholder: E.g. Enhance robustness by adding exception handling and parameter validation to the code

simplify_code.name: Simplify Code
simplify_code.input_prompt: What would you like ZGSM to do?

performance_optimization.name: Performance Optimization
performance_optimization.tip: Improve code performance, provide modification suggestions, focus on efficiency issues
performance_optimization.input_prompt: What would you like ZGSM to do?
performance_optimization.input_placeholder: E.g. Improve code performance, provide modification suggestions, ffocus on efficiency issues to the following code

shenma_instruct_set.input_prompt: What would you like ZGSM to do?
shenma_instruct_set.input_placeholder: E.g. Add comments to the code
